definitions: 火口[ひぐち] (n) burner, nozzle, origin of a fire
火口[かこう] (n) crater, caldera,burner (e.g. on a furnace)
火口[ほくち] (n) tinder, touchwood, charcloth
english: Northern Cave Crater
japanese: 大空洞[火口]

definitions: スチール (n) steel,steal (baseball, basketball),still (picture)
english: Received "Mystile"!
japanese: 『ミ[スティール]』を手にいれた！

definitions: クリスタル (n) crystal
english: Received "Save Crystal"!
japanese: 『セーブ[クリスタル]』を手にいれた！

definitions: よじ登る[よじのぼる] (v5r, vi) to climb, to clamber (over, up), to scramble (up), to scale, to claw one's way up
english: Climb up
japanese: [よじ登る]

definitions: 連れ[つれ] (n, vs) companion, company
english: Welcome! Everyone's waiting for you.
japanese: お[つれ]さまです！皆さんが、中でお待ちです

definitions: シールド (n, vs) shield
english: Received "Shield" Materia!
japanese: 『[シールド]』のマテリアを手にいれた！

definitions: インペリアル (adj-no) imperial
english: Received "Imperial Guard"!
japanese: 『[インペリアル]ガード』を手にいれた！

definitions: 分かれ道[わかれみち] (n) branch, forked road, crossroads, branch road, parting of the ways, turning point
english: Another fork in the road…
japanese: また、[別れ道]か……

definitions: 命運[めいうん] (n) fate, doom
english: All life on this Planet, indeed the very life of this Planet, is in our hands…
japanese: この星のあらゆる生命いや、この星すべての[命運]はオイラたちに、かかってるんだね

definitions: 敢えて[あえて] (adv) purposely (of something needless, unexpected or seemingly counterproductive, etc.), daringly (doing something), deliberately, intentionally,not necessarily, not particularly, not especially,definitely not
english: I'm so happy to have met you all, really! …sniff…
japanese: みなさんに、[あえて]ほんまによかったわ……！

definitions: 怖い[こわい] (adj-i) scary, frightening, eerie, dreadful
強い[こわい] (adj-i) tough, stiff, hard,inflexible, obstinate, stubborn
english: There's nothing to worry about. We're all in this together!
japanese: [コワい]ことなんかあらへん。みぃ～んな、おるんやから

definitions: せっかち (adj-na, n) hasty, impatient
english: You sure are hasty.
japanese: [せっかち]なヤツだ

definitions: 籤[くじ] (n) lottery, lot, raffle, draw
孔子[こうし] (n) Confucius
旧事[きゅうじ] (n) past events, bygones
公事[くじ] (n) political operations, (Heian Period) political operations and ceremonies of the Imperial Court, (Edo Period) civil suit
english: You're so cruel, CLOUD.
japanese: は[くじ]ょうやなぁ、CLOUDさん

definitions: 最下[さいか] (adj-na, n, adj-no) the lowest, the worst
english: Bottom of Northern Cave
japanese: 大空洞[最下]部

definitions: 酔い[よい] (n) drunkenness, intoxication,motion sickness, travel sickness
英[えい] (n, n-pref, n-suf) Britain, British
穎[えい] (n) awn, glume
鋭[えい] (n) sharpness,sharp weapon, blade,fine soldier
鱝[えい] (n) ray (any fish of superorder Batoidea)
嬰[えい] (n, pref) sharp
裔[えい] (n) descendant, scion, lineage
翳[さしは] (n) large fan-shaped object held by an attendant and used to conceal the face of a noble, etc.
纓[えい] (n) tail (of a traditional Japanese cap),chinstrap
Ａ[エー] (n) A, a
栄[えい] (n) glory, prosperity
english: Received "Hero Drink"!
japanese: 『[えい]ゆうのくすり』を手にいれた！

definitions: 薬[くすり] (n) medicine, pharmaceuticals, (legal) drugs, pill, ointment, salve,efficacious chemical (gunpowder, pesticide, etc.),(pottery) glaze,small bribe
english: Received "Hero Drink"!
japanese: 『えいゆうの[くすり]』を手にいれた！

definitions: 総出[そうで] (n) appearing all together
english: %#@^! They're comin' out in full force!
japanese: チッ！　みなさん[総出]でおでむかえかよ！

definitions: 出迎える[でむかえる] (v1, vt) to meet, to greet
english: %#@^! They're comin' out in full force!
japanese: チッ！　みなさん総出でお[でむかえ]かよ！

definitions: 追いつく[おいつく] (v5k, vi) to catch up (with), to draw level, to pull even, to reach,to be compensated, to make up for one's losses
english: You take two of us with you and go first. The rest'll catch up with ya later.
japanese: CLOUD、おまえさんはあと２人くれぇ連れて先に行ってろ。残ったこっちもスグ[おいつく]からよ！

definitions: 持って来い[もってこい] (exp) just right, ideal, perfectly suitable,fetch!, bring me ...
english: Hmm, this might be fun to pass time.
japanese: フッ、ヒマつぶしには[もってこい]だな

definitions: 前足[まえあし] (n) forefoot, forefeet, foreleg, forelimb
english: My front legs…my hind legs… my tail's about to rip off!!
japanese: [前足]が……後ろ足が……シッポがちぎれそうだ！！

definitions: 後ろ足[うしろあし] (n) hind foot, hind-legs
english: My front legs…my hind legs… my tail's about to rip off!!
japanese: 前足が……[後ろ足]が……シッポがちぎれそうだ！！

definitions: 千切れる[ちぎれる] (v1, vi) to be torn off, to come off,to be torn to pieces, to be torn to shreds
english: My front legs…my hind legs… my tail's about to rip off!!
japanese: 前足が……後ろ足が……シッポが[ちぎれ]そうだ！！

definitions: 這いつくばう[はいつくばう] (v5u, vi) to grovel, to go down on one's hands and knees
english: Hoo-ok! I can't be foolin' around in this hell hole…
japanese: ヘッ……！こんな穴ぐらの底でいつまでも[はいつくばっ]てられるかよ……

definitions: 気づく[きづく] (v5k, vi) to notice, to recognize, to recognise, to become aware of, to perceive, to realize, to realise
english: We noticed a little late the trouble we were getting in…
japanese: まちがいに[きづく]んがちぃ～と遅かったんかもしれん……

definitions: 雅致[がち] (n) artistry, good taste, elegance, grace
勝ち[がち] (suf) apt to do, liable to do, tend to do
がち (adj-na) serious, diligent, honest, earnest
english: We noticed a little late the trouble we were getting in…
japanese: まちがいにきづくん[がち]ぃ～と遅かったんかもしれん……

definitions: 凍りつく[こおりつく] (v5k, vi) to freeze to, to be frozen to,to freeze in place, to be still
english: I was frozen in time… But now I feel as though my time is finally beginning!
japanese: あの時に[凍りつい]た私の時間が、今ふたたび動きはじめる……！

definitions: 再び[ふたたび] (adv) again, once more, a second time
english: I was frozen in time… But now I feel as though my time is finally beginning!
japanese: あの時に凍りついた私の時間が、今[ふたたび]動きはじめる……！

definitions: 狭間[はざま] (n) interval, space, interstice, threshold,valley, gorge, ravine,loophole (in a wall), crenel, eyelet
english: Sephiroth, now it's your time to sleep for the ages!!
japanese: セフィロス、今度はおまえが時の[はざま]で眠りにつく番だ！！

definitions: 置き去り[おきざり] (n) leaving behind, desertion, abandonment
english: That's it.
japanese: 不安やなんかはここに[置きざり]にしてさ

definitions: 形[かたち] (n) form, shape, figure,visage
顔[かんばせ] (n) countenance, visage,face, honor (honour), dignity
english: An answer from the planet… the Promised Land…
japanese: 星からの[容]え….約束の地….
